Garfield’s Scary Scavenger Hunt: A Spooky and Fun Adventure Game

Garfield’s Scary Scavenger Hunt is a flash game that was released on the official website of the famous comic strip character Garfield. The game features Garfield as the protagonist, who has to explore a haunted mansion in search of seven delicious treats. Along the way, he has to solve puzzles, avoid monsters and overcome his fear.

Also read: Microsoft and Sony sign deal to keep Call of Duty on PlayStation

Gameplay

The game is a point-and-click adventure game, where the player controls Garfield using the arrow keys or the mouse. The player can interact with objects and characters by clicking on them. The game has two floors and many rooms to explore, some of which are hidden or locked. The player can also access Garfield’s backpack, where he can store up to four items that can help him solve puzzles.

The main objective of the game is to find all seven treats on Garfield’s list, which are:

  • Chocolate cake
  • Donuts
  • Cupcakes
  • Pie
  • Cookies
  • Muffins
  • Brownies

The treats are hidden in various locations in the mansion, and some of them require solving puzzles to obtain them. For example, the player has to rearrange books in the library, crack a code in a safe, play musical instruments in the dining room, and so on.

The game also has a scare meter at the bottom of the screen, which indicates Garfield’s level of fear. The scare meter fills up whenever Garfield encounters something scary, such as ghosts, spiders, bats, skeletons, etc. If the scare meter reaches its maximum, Garfield will run out of the mansion in terror and the game will end. The player can lower the scare meter by waiting for a while or by finding treats.

Graphics and Sound

The game has colorful and cartoonish graphics that match the style of the comic strip. The mansion is designed with a lot of details and spooky elements, such as cobwebs, paintings, candles, etc. The game also has animations and sound effects that add to the atmosphere of the game. For example, Garfield will react to different situations with expressions and comments, and the monsters will make noises when they appear.

The game also has a catchy and spooky background music that plays throughout the game. The music changes depending on the room and the situation, creating a sense of tension and suspense. The music also helps to set the mood for the game, as it is both fun and scary at the same time.

Reception

Garfield’s Scary Scavenger Hunt was well-received by fans and critics alike, who praised its gameplay, graphics and sound. The game was considered to be one of the best games on Garfield’s website, and one of the best Halloween-themed games online. The game was also popular among children and adults alike, as it offered a balance between challenge and entertainment.

The game was so successful that it spawned a sequel, Garfield’s Scary Scavenger Hunt 2: Donuts of Doom, which was released in 2008. The sequel featured more rooms, more puzzles, more monsters and more treats to find. The sequel also improved on some aspects of the original game, such as adding a map and a hint system.

Conclusion

Garfield’s Scary Scavenger Hunt is a fun and spooky adventure game that fans of Garfield and Halloween will enjoy. The game offers a lot of content and replay value, as it has many rooms to explore, puzzles to solve and treats to find. The game also has a great presentation, with colorful graphics, catchy music and humorous sound effects. The game is suitable for players of all ages and skill levels, as it is easy to play but hard to master.

If you are looking for a game that will make you laugh and scream at the same time, you should try Garfield’s Scary Scavenger Hunt. You can play it online for free at NuMuKi or Kizi. You can also learn more about the game at TV Tropes or Escape Games 24. You can also download the original flash file from Archive.org.
